channel.title: How do I make theiving stalls in my server work?
channel.description:
[code]public void NewObjects(){ makeGlobalObject(3033, 3357, 2561, 0, 10);//baker stall makeGlobalObject(3033, 3349, 2565, 0, 10);//silver stall makeGlobalObject(3036, 3360, 4877, 0, 10);//runes stall[/code]
The stalls are in the client.java, but how do I get the stalls to [b]work?[/b][br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 06, 2009, 01:40:43 pm[/size][hr]By the way running a 317 source [b]not 508[/b]

item.title: How do I make theiving stalls in my server work?
item.dc:creator: @mmaKush mmaKush
item.description:
@mmaKush wrote:

You need to add them ObjectFirstClick(If you have that class), or in your objectFirstClick method, now it won’t be called that but it should be similar. What you basically want to do is create a packet that when you click on that specific stall’s ID, that packet is processed and your player thieves the stall, gains XP, and gets something in return.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make theiving stalls in my server work?
